action.action-desc: Mr. Pierluisi (for himself, Ms. Norton, and Ms. Bordallo) submitted the following resolution; which was referred to the Committee on Rules

form.official-title: Amending the Rules of the House of Representatives to allow Delegates and the Resident Commissioner to file, sign, and call up discharge petitions.

section.text: That clause 2 of rule XV of the Rules of the House of Representatives is amended as follows:

paragraph.text: In paragraph (b), after Member each place it appears insert , Delegate, or Resident Commissioner.
In paragraph (c), after Member insert , Delegate, or Resident Commissioner and after Members each place it appears insert , Delegates, or Resident Commissioner.
In the fifth sentence of paragraph (c), after a majority of the total membership of the House, insert , plus all Delegates and the Resident Commissioner,.
In paragraph (d)(1), after Member insert , Delegate, or Resident Commissioner.
In paragraph (e)(2), after Member insert , Delegate, or Resident Commissioner.
